issue.title: [Java] Improve the readability and performance of BitVectorHelper#getNullCount
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5843](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5843). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Improve the implementation by:
1. Count the number of 1 bits by long or int, instead of by byte
2. If the number of value count is a multiple of 8, there is no need to process the last byte separately. This makes the code clearer.
